Founded in 2013, Anova helped transform the smart kitchen appliance market with the launch of the first commercially available and affordable sous vide immersion circulator. Today with its family of Anova Precision® products, Anova is a leading provider of sous vide cookers.

t: Sous Vide Technology Is Always Evolving — We Tested 16 of the Latest Models
s: Though we like a few Anova models, the Anova Culinary Wi-Fi Immersion Circulator is our favorite from the San Francisco brand and the best model we tested. The sous vide machine comes with onboard controls, so you don't have to use an app for cooking with the product.
